events.text:
Well, this place is littered with explosives… and dust... could do with a good sweep, if ye ask me. 

Thankfully, whoever put those explosives ‘ere signified their locations with some convenient number-shaped rocks. 

If ya think ye’ve sniffed out a bomb, place some planks over it. it’ll help ye remember it, and ye’ll be able to safely step over the boulders. 

It’s a dangerous adventure, but I know the rumours o’ the treasures inside are more persuasive than I could e’er be.
